title.rendered: Birlasoft supports Smile Foundation’s SKilling Programme

content.rendered:
birlasoft supports Smile Foundation's Skilling programme

In the year 2020-21, Birlasoft actively participated in supporting Smile Foundation’s Skilling project known as e-vidya. Additionally, Birlasoft also initiated a scholarship project specifically designed for girls pursuing vocational courses. Under the e-vidya project, more than 140 young individuals received comprehensive training, resulting in approximately 90 students securing placements.

Regarding the scholarship project, initially, Birlasoft provided scholarships to 90 girls enrolled in vocational courses. Subsequently, in phase 2, this number was increased to support 375 girls. Currently, there are plans to launch the third phase of the project, which aims to extend scholarships to an additional 600 girl students.

Birlasoft is a renowned provider of IT consulting services, specializing in various areas such as data analytics, IT transformation, application management, testing, CRM, cloud computing, infrastructure, and more.
